snippet: One of Qatar’s first female athletes to compete at the Olympics, the shooter Bahiya al-Hamad, will be the flag-bearer for the opening ceremony at the London Games.
abstract: One of Qatar’s first female athletes to compete at the Olympics, the shooter Bahiya al-Hamad, will be the flag-bearer for the opening ceremony at the London Games.
lead_paragraph: One of Qatar’s first female athletes to compete at the Olympics, the shooter Bahiya al-Hamad, will be the flag-bearer for the opening ceremony at the London Games.
